title: BMAT03
alarm_message: Lidding Foil Pin Hole not Ready
reasons_remedies: Lidding Foil Pin Hole is not Ready/powered on. a. Check if the Lidding Foil Pin Hole system is ready and powered on..
The ready signal is not coming from the Lidding foil pin hole system. a. Check the signal coming from the pin hole system and take corrective action.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMAT03
Error Code 03
Category: BMAT
Title: BMAT03
Alarm Message: Lidding Foil Pin Hole not Ready
Reason & Remedy:
1. Lidding Foil Pin Hole is not Ready/powered on. a. Check if the Lidding Foil Pin Hole system is ready and powered on..
2. The ready signal is not coming from the Lidding foil pin hole system. a. Check the signal coming from the pin hole system and take corrective action.
Visual References:
- Camera System Location
